feed.title: Sudden temporary drop in reachable nodes?

entry.title: Sudden temporary drop in reachable nodes?
entry.summary: According to the context given, a person named Addy has been approached with a concern regarding the significant drop in reachable nodes on http://getaddr.bitnodes.io/dashboard/. The drop was observed around March 25th, between 7:20 pm and 9:35 pm. The person is seeking clarification on whether this is a technical glitch in the monitoring system or an actual network event. It is unclear what caused the drop in reachable nodes, but it is certain that the person is concerned about it and wants to figure out the reason behind it.
